answers.answer: I'm doing my 3hr glucose test right now as well. I had GD with my last pregnancy. Good luck hun

I failed both the 1 hour and 3 hour.  So now they say I have gestational diabetes.  My numbers weren't extremely bad so they let me control it with diet only and no insulin.  At first I was very upset and thought I did something wrong but it can happen to anyone.  I didn't have it with my first pregnancy but got it with this one.  Once I met with the dietician it really helped me to figure out how many carbs I could have at a time in a day.  It's hard sometimes to cut back on sweets and manage your portions, but it's all worth it in the end to make sure you'll have a healthy baby.  Good luck with everything!

question: Failed the 1hr. I'm 30 weeks and on my way to the doctors to take the 3hr test. Has anyone else taken the 3hr but failed? :/ They said I would be considered high risk if I fail again
title: 3 hr glucose test
